query:
SELECT d.id, d.title, d.taskId, d.checklistId, t.name as taskName, tc.templateId
FROM defects d 
LEFT JOIN tasks t ON d.taskId = t.id
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON d.checklistId = tc.id
LIMIT 10;
command:

FROM defects d 
LEFT JOIN tasks t ON d.taskId = t.id
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON d.checklistId = tc.id
LIMIT 10;
